author: pjquirk
body:
# Steps to reproduce

Not yet known, the crash is random and infrequent but has been seen in the 7.0 RCs. We have a set of powershell scripts that sets up our web application's environment, and I only see the crash when running these scripts.

In case it's relevant, our scripts create a new pwsh process to execute in, and its the new pwsh process that is crashing.

I'll work on narrowing down the reproduction steps, but reporting now in case there are some clues in the crash report.
